name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gregory HANIBLE, Appellant (two cases)

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gregory HANIBLE, Appellant (two cases).

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of Sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Albert Ominsky, Drew S. Dorfman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Nancy D. Wasser, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
385 A.2d 974
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Gregory HANIBLE, Appellant (two cases).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 17, 1978.
Decided May 15, 1978.
Albert Ominsky, Drew S. Dorfman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Edward G. Rendell, Dist. Atty., Steven H. Goldblatt, Deputy Dist. Atty. for Law, Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Nancy D. Wasser, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
